valid_articles.Title: Bing Does Not Yet Use ProductGroup Markup But They May In The Future
valid_articles.Description: Microsoft Bing may use ProductGroup markup in the future for its "captions" in the Bing Search results.  Fabrice Canel from Microsoft said while they do not support it yet, "it’s on our radar" and "the team is closely monitoring its adoption."

valid_articles.Title: Bing Treats 308 Redirects The Same As 301 Redirects
valid_articles.Description: Fabrice Canel from Microsoft said that Bing Search treats 308 redirects the same as they treat 301 redirects.  This is the same as what Google said back in 2021, although Google has been a bit wishy-washy on redirects over the years.
